comments.author: Hanah Rose Stiverson
comments.content: Do you ever come near Ann Arbor? I would love to visit an event and get a cookbook signed!

comments.author: Herbivoracious
comments.content: Hey Hanah - the closest I know I'm going to be to Ann Arbor is Chicago :(. Would love to make it to AA sometime, but no current plans.  (Here's my event calendar https://herbivoracious.com/upcoming-events). Thank you for being interested!!
